sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SLOOP, a ſmall veſſel furniſhed with one mail, the mainſail of which is attached to a gaff above, or to the mast on its foremoſt edge, and to a long boom below, by which it is occasionally ſhifted to either quarter. See Ship.
Stoop of War, a name given to the ſmalleſt veſſels of war except cutters. They are either rigged as ſhips or ſnows.
